columns.name: alert_number
columns.description: The security alert number.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the Dependabot alert.

columns.name: dependency_package_ecosystem
columns.description: The package's language or package management ecosystem.

columns.name: dependency_package_name
columns.description: The unique package name within its ecosystem.

columns.name: dependency_manifest_path
columns.description: The unique manifestation path within the ecosystem.

columns.name: dependency_scope
columns.description: The execution scope of the vulnerable dependency.

columns.name: security_advisory_ghsa_id
columns.description: The unique GitHub Security Advisory ID assigned to the advisory.

columns.name: security_advisory_cve_id
columns.description: The unique CVE ID assigned to the advisory.

columns.name: security_advisory_summary
columns.description: A short, plain text summary of the advisory.

columns.name: security_advisory_description
columns.description: A long-form Markdown-supported description of the advisory.

columns.name: security_advisory_severity
columns.description: The severity of the advisory.

columns.name: security_advisory_cvss_score
columns.description: The overall CVSS score of the advisory.

columns.name: security_advisory_cvss_vector_string
columns.description: The full CVSS vector string for the advisory.

columns.name: security_advisory_cwes
columns.description: The associated CWEs

columns.name: security_advisory_published_at
columns.description: The time that the advisory was published.

columns.name: security_advisory_updated_at
columns.description: The time that the advisory was last modified.

columns.name: security_advisory_withdrawn_at
columns.description: The time that the advisory was withdrawn.

columns.name: url
columns.description: The REST API URL of the alert resource.

columns.name: html_url
columns.description: The GitHub URL of the alert resource.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The time that the alert was created.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The time that the alert was last updated.

columns.name: dismissed_at
columns.description: The time that the alert was dismissed.

columns.name: dismissed_reason
columns.description: The reason that the alert was dismissed.

columns.name: dismissed_comment
columns.description: An optional comment associated with the alert's dismissal.

columns.name: fixed_at
columns.description: The time that the alert was no longer detected and was considered fixed.

columns.name: organization
columns.description: The login name of the organization.
